H0.text: Mordant is the general term for a chemical which allows what to work properly. Paint

H1.text: Mordant is the general term for a chemical which allows what to work properly. Ink

H2.text: Mordant is the general term for a chemical which allows what to work properly. Stain

H3.text: Mordant is the general term for a chemical which allows what to work properly. DYE

A4.text: Mordant dyes require a mordant, which improves the fastness of the dye against water, light and perspiration.

A5.text: A dye is a colored substance that chemically bonds to the material to which it is being applied. This distinguishes dyes from pigments which do not chemically bind to the material they color. Dye is generally applied in an aqueous solution and may require a mordant to improve the fastness of the dye on the fiber.
